1.1.name: wordpress/flip-pong-v
1.1.description: This is the ultimate HTML5 flipbook: Every page is made of one image, with a nice flipping pages effect. You can flip pages with the mouse as a real book, or use left/right buttons. The admin pannel helps you to insert, remove and order your pages. You also choose dimensions of each flipbook. You can enable a shadow around the flipbook.
